channel.title: Had Jagex always intended for the censor to be optional?
channel.description: The censoring of messages, both public and private, occurs in the client. Had Jagex always planned for the censor to be optional, or was this simply "the way they did it"? I never played RSC so I'm not sure of the presence of a censor there.

item.title: Had Jagex always intended for the censor to be optional?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

It was not originally implemented in rsc and the original version just changed words to cabbage as I recall its always been client side however probably for server performance.

Read full topic
item.source: Had Jagex always intended for the censor to be optional?

item.title: Had Jagex always intended for the censor to be optional?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:4, topic:545431”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=664315.msg4440784#msg4440784 date=1406576684]

Its divided in 4 in RSC. Quest, Public, Private, and something else.

I mean the censor that turns “dick” into “****”.
[/quote]
Oh. The profanity filter was added pretty later into the game. I remember the update clearly (and my older brother putting it on in my account immediately xD)[/quote]

Yes, I know it became optional fairly recently, however if you look in the client it is actually applied client-side (level 3 administrators can swear without being censored)

Read full topic
item.source: Had Jagex always intended for the censor to be optional?

item.title: Had Jagex always intended for the censor to be optional?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:3, topic:545431”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=664315.msg4440783#msg4440783 date=1406576536]
Its divided in 4 in RSC. Quest, Public, Private, and something else.
[/quote]

I mean the censor that turns “dick” into “****”.[/quote]
Oh. The profanity filter was added pretty later into the game. I remember the update clearly (and my older brother putting it on in my account immediately xD)

Read full topic
